name: A Way Back To Home
description:
Install instructions

A Way Back To Home is a 2D co-op platformer, puzzle game.
This game was developed as a final exam for the Introduction to Game Engines course. It was my first experience, our first experience. Because it was developed by 3 people.
Producers : Adil Furkan Yıldırım, Ertan Berkay Tarı, Tolga Önal
